NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Exclusive Opportunity with Starbucks, only for The Challenge
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
How many people does it take to make a cup of coffee...? What do you need to do to run your own business…? Want to design your own coffee store...?
Join us for an exclusive peek behind the scenes at Starbucks, as the Managing Directors, Executives and Store Managers open their doors for ONE day only, giving you insights to the tricks of their trade!
This is YOUR golden Ticket.
'Open Starbucks' has been designed in partnership with The Challenge with YOU in mind. Its aim is to give you top tips, interview skills, and an insight into the types of careers available within a global retail brand.
You will have the opportunity to…
Learn about the hundreds of different career paths available in a company like Starbucks – directly meeting and interacting with the partners (employees) who work in teams including Marketing, IT, Design, Finance, Customer Care, Operations… and many more!
Network and involve yourself with a 'one off' Question Time session with the Managing Directors
Learn how to "sell yourself", "progress your way up" and "prepare well for interviews" to ensure you make yourself a great candidate for any job.
Gain exclusive 1:1 advice on YOUR CV and explore career options with some of the top business men and women in the UK
“Open Starbucks” will take place from 10-4pm on Thursday 9th April at the Starbucks European headquarters in Chiswick, London. Free lunch (and coffee!) included. If you would like to attend, please register here now: http://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/open-starbucks-young-people-take-over-hq-in-partnership-w-the-challenge-tickets-16154574768
Don't miss out! Tickets are limited!
See you there.
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
